SALES REPRESENTATIVE-PSR

SUMMARY

Customer — oriented , strategic-thinking Sales and Management Professional with over 10+ years of experience.
Background in building relationships, cultivating partnerships, retaining top accounts and growing profit channels by establishing trust.
Persuasive, self-motivated leadership professional with expertise in management and sales.
Proven skills in promoting products and boosting revenue by connecting with customers and effectively communicating sales recommendations.
Proactive, well-organized sales leader successful at meeting and exceeding targets with strategic approaches.
Skilled lead generator, product demonstrator and problem-solver.

SKILLS

Relationship selling Territory sales Sales closing Product management and pricing Product and service knowledge Post-sales support Territory growth Product merchandising
Sales Forecasting Client account management Promotional planning Revenue growth Team building and leadership Brand management Working collaboratively Organizational and People skills

EXPERIENCE

Fostered relationships with customers to expand customer base and retain business.
Kept up-to-date with regional market and industry trends to optimize marketing and sales plans.

Demonstrated product features to align with customer needs.
Created successful strategies to develop and expand customer sales.
Contacted new and existing customers to outline benefits of products.
Improved profitability and developed pipeline using multiple marketing channels and sales strategies.

Monitored customer order process and addressed customer issues.
Prepared and processed contracts and order forms for new and existing customers.

Demonstrated strong analytical and financial skills while maintaining budget, processing payroll, implementing cost controls, and evaluating income estimates, profit and loss statements, sales and labor flash reports.

Retained remarkable service standards by hiring highly talented staff for all departments.

Consistently maintained high levels of cleanliness, organization, storage, and sanitation of food and beverage products to ensure quality.

Performed restaurant walk-throughs to gauge timeliness and excellent service quality.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Superintendent

Location: Kalamazoo, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
The Superintendent – Paper Machine is the leading member of the Paper Department’s management team that is responsible for providing overall leadership, operational strategies, and ensuring excellent safety performance. This role ensures the safe and efficient operations of all activities in the Paper Department as part of an integrated mill.Duties & Responsibilities (include but are not limited to the following):Utilize and refine standard work systems to effect sustainable positive results in safety, environmental, people, quality, cost, and performanceDemonstrate safety as a core value by creating a safe work environmentLead safety systems and processes that support achieving our continually improving annual goalsEnsure efficient operation of paper machine and/or extruder machineDevelop and implement quality strategies ensuring compliance with customer specificationsDevelop leadership reports through mentorship and proven leadership and accountability methodsCollaborates with all levels of management personnel to establish production and quality control standards, develop budgets and cost controls to help ensure long term sustainabilityManage all area production activities and establish area production priorities for products in keeping with effective operations and cost factorsDevelop area budgets and manage costs within established budget and take ownership for financial performance of areaImplement and manage improvement strategies designed to: include all other production areas, increase customer satisfaction, increase yield and operating efficiency, reduce cost, and improve reliability.Enforce strict safety standards and practices. Be aware of existing safety hazards and make every feasible attempt to correct these hazardsCollaborate with Mill Leadership, Maintenance, Quality, Shipping and area leadership assuring alignment with meeting quality standards and operational efficienciesDetermine capital needs of area and develop and oversee area capital improvement projectsProvide input on capital projects and strategic improvement plans for all other Mill areasEnsure communication of business strategy, goals, and initiatives to mill and area leadershipManages continuous improvement projects for area of responsibilityCoordinates with maintenance to prioritize maintenance and outage needsCoordinates predictive and preventative maintenance activities establishing long-term sustainability for equipmentDevelop and execute strategic plans to increase overall area efficiencyReviews and analyzes production, quality control, maintenance, and operational reports to determine causes of nonconformity with product specifications, and operating or production problemsDevelops strategy to ensure operational efficiencies, standard operating methods and procedures designed to eliminate throughput issues and improve product qualityMaintain effective communications and working relationships with Operations Departments, Suppliers, Maintenance, Safety, IT, Environmental, Human Resources, Engineering, and PurchasingOther duties as assigned

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
